SHORT_CONTRACT_DESCRIPTION.P: Nutrient Media and Reagents for Cultivation and Identification of Microorganisms

F02_ANNEX_B.LOT_TITLE: Base for chromogenic media for differentiation of urinary insulates petri plates with a diameter of 90 mm; pH 6.6-7.0. To contain a minimum (g / L): Pepton 15.00000, Chromogenic mixture 26.30000, Agar 15.00000

Base for chromogenic media for differentiation of Candida yeast, petri plates with a diameter of 90; pH 6.0-6.4. To contain a minimum (g / l): Tripton 20.00000, Glucose 1.00000, Chloramphenicol 0.05000, Gentamicin 0.20000, Chromogenic mixture 0.10000, Meat extract 18.50000, Agar 13.00000

Base of agar for isolation of Campylobacter Helicobacter, petri plates with a diameter of 90 mm; pN 7.1-7.5. To contain a minimum (g / L): Colombian blood agar base 39.00000, sodium pyruvate 0.25000, sodium metabisulfite 0.25000, iron sulfate 0.25000, bacitracin 25.000.00000 IU, amphotericin B 0.01000, colist sulphate 10,000.00000 IU, cefazolin sodium 0.01500, novobiocin 0.00500, defibrillated sheep blood 70.00000 ML

Selective agar for isolation of Haemophilus Petri plates with a diameter of 90 mm; Ph 7.0-7.4. To contain a minimum of (g / L): peptones 15.00000 g / l, corn starch 1.00000, sodium chloride 5.00000, agar 10.00000, defibrillated horse blood 100.00000ML, Bacitracin 50.000.00IU, Vancomycin 6.000.00000IU, Dipotasium hydrogen phosphate 4.00000, Potassium dihydrogen phosphate 1.00000, glucose 2.00000, Vitamin B12 0.00020, L-glutamine 0.20000, Adenine 0.02000, Guanine 0.00060, p-Aminobenzoic acid 0.00026, L-cystine 0.02200, NAD 0.00500, carboxylase 0.00200, Iron nitrate 0.00040, Thyamine 0.00006, Cysteine 0.51800, Amphotericin B 0.00800

Chocolate agar base enriched with XV factor for isolation of Haemophilus petri plates with a diameter of 90 mm; pH 7.0-7.4. To contain a minimum of (g / L): Special peptone 15.00000, Corn starch 1.00000, Sodium chloride 5.00000, Dicalium hydrogen phosphate 4.00000, Potassium dihydrogen phosphate 1.00000, Glucose 2.00000, Hemoglobin 10.00000, Vitamin B12 0.00020, L-Glutamine 0.20000, Adenine 0.02000, Guanine 0.00060, p-Aminobenzoic acid 0.00026, L-Cystine 0.02200 NAD (Coenzym1) 0.00500, Cocharboxylase 0.00200, Iron nitrate 0.00040, Thyamine 0.00006, Cysteine 0.51800, Agar 12.00000

Base of agar media for isolation of Gardnerela petri plates with a diameter of 90 mm; pH; 7.1-7.5. To contain a minimum (g / l): Blood agar base 43.00000, non-ionic surfactant of polyethylene group (polysorbate 80) 0.07500 ML, gentamicin sulphate 0.00400, nalidixic acid 0.03000, amphotericin B 0.00200, human red cells 50.00000 ML

Base of Schaedler blood agar for isolation of anaerobic bacteria, petrite plates with a diameter of 90 mm; pH: 7.4-7.8. To contain a minimum (g / L): Trypticas soybean 10.00000, special peptone 5.00000, Yeast extract 5.00000, Glucose 5.00000, Sodium chloride 4.00000, Cysteine HCl 0.40000, Tris buffer 0.75000, Hemin 0.01000, Vitamin K1 0.00200, Agar 13.50000, Defibrinated sheep blood 50.00000 ML

Base of CIN Agar for isolation of Yersinia petri plates with a diameter of 90 mm; pH 7.2 - 7.6. To contain a minimum (g / l): special peptone 20.00000, yeast extract 2.00000, mannitol 20.00000, sodium pyruvate 2.00000, sodium chloride 2.00000, magnesium sulphate 0.01000, sodium deoxycholate 0.50000, neutral 0.03000, crystal violet 0.00100, cefsulodine 0.01500,, Novobiocin 0.00250, Agar 12.50000

Base of Mueller Hinton agar for the detection of antimicrobial osteobility, petri dishes with a diameter of 90 mm; pH 7.3 +/- 0.1 To contain a minimum (g / L): Beef infusion 2.00, Casein hydrolase 17.50, Starch 1.50, Agar 17.00. The height of the plastic on the base should be 18 mm, the plastic to be firm and unbreakable. The agar thickness should be 4mm ± 0.5mm, according to EUCAST standard or equivalent for antimicrobial susceptibility

Base of Mueller Hinton agar with 5 % blood from sheep for the detection of antimicrobial osteobility, petri plates with a diameter of 90 mm; composition according to EUCAST standard for antimicrobial susceptibility (g / L): Special peptone 23.00000, starch 1.00000, sodium chloride 5.00000, agar 10.00000, defibrillated sheep blood 50.00000 ML

Base for Thaer Martine agar for isolation of Neisseria petri plates with a diameter of 90 mm; pH: 7.0-7.4. To contain a minimum (g / L): Special peptone 15.00000, Corn starch 1.00000, Sodium chloride 5.00000, Dicalium hydrogen phosphate 4.00000, Potassium dihydrogen phosphate 1.00000, Hemoglobin 10.00000 Vitox 20.00000 ML, Vankomycin 0.00500, Colystin methane sulphate 0.00750, Amphotericin B 0.00800, Trimethoprim 0.00500, Agar 10.00000

Blood agar with sheep blood for multiplication of bacteria, petri dishes with a diameter of 90 mm; pH 7.1-7.5, Contains minimum (g / L): peptones 23.00000, starch 1.00000, sodium chloride 5.00000, agar 10.00000, defibrillated sheep blood 50.00000ML

Selective medium for the isolation of Clostridium difficile petri plates with a diameter of 90 mm; pH 7.2-7.6. To contain a minimum of (g / L): Pratose peptone 40.00000, Disodium hydrogen phosphate 5.00000, Potassium dihydrogen phosphate 1.00000 Magnesium sulfate 0.10000 Sodium chloride 2.00000 Fructose 6.00000 D-cycloserine 0.50000 Cefoxitin 0.01600 Agar 15.00000, defibrinated horse blood 70.00000 ML

Enterococcus agar for the detection of vancomycin resistant enterococci (VRE); petri plates with a diameter of 90 mm; pH 7,2 +/- 1 % The medium to contain a minimum of (g / l): Casein and meat extract 18, Cardiac peptone 3, Corn starch 1, Sodium chloride 6, Agar 15.0, Chromogenic mixture 0.12, Selective mixture 52.3, 1l
Contact media with neutralization for disinfectants; petri plates with a diameter of 90 mm; for taking a sample of an inanimate environment
Contact media with Sabouraud dextrose agar for the detection of yeasts and molds; petri plates with a diameter of 90 mm; to enable isolation and enumeration of yeasts and molds
Chromogenic selective media for differentiation MRSA; petri plates with a diameter of 90 mm; To contain basic nutrients, chromogenic mixture and oxacillin for selective growth of only MRSA strains

Chromogenic media for the detection of Streptococcus B group; petri plates with a diameter of 90 mm; pH 7,4 +/- 1 % to contain a minimum of (g / l): Casein and meat extract 8, Brain-heart extract 5, Carbohydrates 3, Salts 1,085, Agar 13,0, Chromogenic mixture 0,58, Antibiotic mixture 17,3, 1l
Chromogenic media for the detection of C difficile; petri plates with a diameter of 90 mm; pH 7.6 ± 0.2. to contain sodium chloride, fructose, yolk, nutrient matter for growth of the bacteria
Selective media for isolation of H pylori; petri plates with a diameter of 90 mm; to contain a minimum of special peptone, starch, inhibitory agents

F02_ANNEX_B.LOT_TITLE: Methyl Red - Voges Proskauer broth (granular dry substance) for biochemical identification of enterobacteria; minimum 500 g

Rambach Agar or equivalent (granular dry substance) for the cultivation of salmonella; pH: 7.3 ± 0.2 in the ready-prepared preparation to contain a minimum (g / L): Pepton 8.0, Sodium Chloride 5.0, Sodium deoxycholate 1.0, chromogenic mixture 1.5; propylene glycol 10.5; agaragar 15.0, minimum 120 g
Brain base - heart infusion broth (granular dry matter) for cultivation; pH 7.2 - 7.6; minimum 500 g

SS agar base (granular dry matter) for the cultivation of enterobacteria; pH: 7.0 + -0.2; (g / L): Pepton 10.0, Lactose 10.0, Yolk 8.5, Sodium citrate 10.0, Sodium thiosulfate 8.5, Ammonium iron (3) citrate 1.0, brilliant green 0.0003, neutral red 0.025, Agar 12;, minimum 500 g

Base Selenit F broth (granular dry substance) to enhance the growth of salmonella; to contain a minimum (g / L): Pepton 5.0, Lactose 4.0, Sodium Selenite 4.0, Dicalium Hydrogen Phosphate 3.5, Potassium Dihydrogen Phosphate 6.5; minimum 500 g
Yersinia bujon base (granular dry matter) for cultivation; in the ready-prepared media to contain minimum nutrient matter for growth of Yersinia;, minimum 500 g

Miller Hinton agar (granular dry substance) for the examination of antimicrobial susceptibility; pH: 7.4 ± 0.2 in the finished prepared substrate; to contain a minimum (g / l): Meat infusion 2.0, Casein hydrolysis 17.5, Steroid 1.5, Agar 13.0; Equivalent to the EUCAST standard for antimicrobial susceptibility; minimum 500 g or equivalent

DNA for test agar for differentiation of Staphylococcus aureus (granular dry substance) for biochemical identification; pH: 7.3 ± 0.2 in ready-prepared base. To contain minimum (g / L): Tryptose 20.0, Sodium Chloride 5.0, DNA 2.0, Agar 15.0; granular, minimum 500 g

Cligler medium agar (granular dry substance) for cultivation and biochemical identification; pH: 7.4 ± 0.2 in the ready-prepared media, to contain a minimum of (g / L): Pepperon of casein 15.0, Meat peptone 15.0, Meat extract 3.0, Yeast extract 3.0, Sodium chloride 5.0, Lactose 10.0, D (+) glucose 1.0, Ammonium iron citrate 0.5, Sodium thiosulphate 0.5, Phenol red 0.024, Agar 12.0; minimum 500 g

Simmons citrate agar (granular dry substance) for biochemical examination; pH: 6.6 ± 0.2; (g / L) in ready prepared media to contain minimum: Ammonium dihydrogen phosphate 1.0, Dicalium hydrogen phosphate 1.0, Sodium chloride 5.0, Sodium citrate 2.0, Magnesium sulfate 0.2, Bromimol blue 0.08, Agar 13.0; minimum 500 g
Esculin bouillon (dry substance) for biochemical examination; the buoy must not contain azide; minimum 500 g
Peptone water (buffered) for cultivation; minimum 500 g
Nitrate broth (not granulated dry substance) for biochemical identification; in the finished prepared media to contain: meat extract, peptone, potassium nitrate; maximum 500 g
agar - agar (granular dry substance) for media cultivation; for preparation of nutrient media; minimum 500 g

Trypto casein broth (granular dry substance) for cultivation; pH: 7.3 ± 0.2; to contain a minimum of (g / L): Peptone from casein 17.0, soybean peptone 13.0, D (+) glucose monohydrate 2.5, sodium chloride 5.0, dicalium hydrogen phosphate 2.5; minimum 500 g

Cristensen's urea - broth (granular dry substance) for biochemical identification; pH: 6.8 ± 0.2; in the ready prepared media to contain a minimum (g / L): Yeast extract 0.1, Potassium dihydrogen phosphate 9.1, Disodium hydrogen phosphate 9.5, urea 20, phenol red 0.01; minimum 500 g

Sorbitol McConkey agar (non granulated dry substance) for the detection of isolation and enumeration of E coli O157; pH: 7.1 ± 0.2; in the ready prepared media to contain a minimum of (g / l): Pepton 20.0, Sodium Chloride 5.0, Yolk Salts 31.5, Sorbitol 10.0, Crystal Violet 0.001, Neutral Red 0.03, Agar 15.0; minimum 500 g
Sabouraud agar with 2 % glucose (media for primary fungi isolation) - dehydrated media
thioglycolic acid GR for analysis Reag. Ph Eur, 100ml
L-cysteine, 97 %, in a package of 100g
D (-) - mannitol for microbiological analyzes, 500gr
neutral red indicator, 100g
absolute ethyl alcohol for analyzes EMSURE, 1L
sodium tauricholate hydrate> = 97 %, 5 g
Clostridium difficile supplement 5VL
sodium hydrogen carbonate for analyzes EMSURE, Reag Ph Eur, 500g
Strips for oxidase reaction; minimum 50 per container

Spores of bacteria Geobacillus stearothermophilus ATCC 7953 or equivalent and Bacillus atrophaeus ATCC 9372 or equivalent for the control of sterilization with a medium; to contain two types of spores: for control of autoclaves and for control of dry sterilizers
Sputasol prepared solution of pH 7.4 ± 0.2; for liquidation of sputum; a minimum amount in one vial of 7.5 mL
Anaerobic indicator for a container of minimum 2.5L; to provide a reliable confirmation of anaerobic conditions

Set of 4 different discs for the detection of carbapenemasis; at least 50 discs for: - Carbapenem 10 micrograms; - Carbapenem 10 micrograms + metal-beta-lactamase inhibitor; - Carbapenem 10 micrograms + KPC enzyme inhibitor; - carbapenem 10 micrograms + AmpC enzyme inhibitor
Haemolyled horse blood, additive for enrichment of media, in package of maximum of 100 ml
Transport medium for H pylori, test tubes with a minimum of 2.5 mL
Concentrate for faeces parasites, a minimum volume of 50ml

System (reagent kits) for microaerophilic incubation for a container volume of at least 2,5 l

DEPOSITS_GUARANTEES_REQUIRED.P: Contract Performance Guarantee: Bank Guarantee of 10 %.

ECONOMIC_OPERATORS_PERSONAL_SITUATION.P: Statement by the economic operator that it has not been sentenced, in the last 5 years, with effective Court decision for participation in criminal organization, corruption, fraud or money laundering,
Certificate that it is not subject to bankruptcy procedure issued by competent authority,
Certificate for paid taxes, contributions and other public dues by the competent authority in the country where that economic operator is established,

Certificate from the Legal Entities Penal Registry that it is not being imposed a side sanction — prohibition to participate in public competitions, public procurement contract award and public-private partnership contract award procedures,
Certificate from the Legal Entities Penal Registry that it is not being imposed a side sanction — temporary or permanent prohibition to perform certain professional activity,

Certificate that it is not being sanctioned for misdemeanor with an effective Court decision, resulting in prohibition for pursuing professional activity or duty, i.e. temporary prohibition for performing certain activity.
Ability of the economic operator to perform business activity:

Document for registered business activity - In order to prove the ability to perform professional activity, the economic operator should submit a document for registered activity as evidence that it is registered as a natural or legal person for performing the activity related to the subject of the public procurement contract or evidence that it belongs to a suitable professional association in accordance with the regulations of the country where it is registered,

Evidence issued by a competent body for fulfilling the special conditions for performing the activity prescribed in accordance with the law that relate to the subject of the contract-Certificate for wholesale of medical devices in accordance with the Law on Medicines and Medical Devices.

USE_ELECTRONIC_AUCTION.P: To participate on electronic auction economic operators need to register on ESPP (Electronic System for Public Procurement) website: https://www.e-nabavki.gov.mk/
Tender documentation, technical specifications, forms and information regarding Open Procedure No 08/2018 are provided on the same website.
